contest-event.event-date: Oct. 1, 1910 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Gems of Schubert Crystal Palace (Concert Hall), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK Prizes: 1st: 40 Pounds plus 1000 Guinea Trophy 2nd: 30 Pounds plus Daily Telegraph cup 3rd: 20 Pounds plus instrument 4th: 16 Pounds plus Royal class euphonium 5th: 12 Pounds plus Slide trombone 6th: 10 Pounds Trombone 7th: 5 Pounds plus Silver plated cornet June 1, 2011, 12:57 p.m. Aug. 28, 2013, 1:38 p.m. 1 Fodens Band William Halliwell 2 Irwell Springs Alexander Owen 3 Spencer's Steelworks Prize Band William Halliwell 4 Shaw Band William Halliwell 5 Kettering Town Silver Band John Gladney Jnr 6 Hebden Bridge Band J. A.
